A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: DEFINITELY one of my fave Episodes in the series.  Before the film was released I had come to my own conclusions about certain plot threads and how they would work out\,  but the film subverted each expectation\, surprising me each time. The only reason it doesn't get Five Stars is because I found one minor plot thread extraneous. Already saw it twice and can't wait to see it again.
